name: Word Merge-Words Search Peak
description:
Crazy for word game? Addicted to brain teaser? Wanna sharpen your mind? Word Merge will fit for you! Similar with crossword but more addictive, it will take you through a word trek and make you a true word genius!

5 reasons you should get Word Merge:
- A smart game to exercise your memory and improve your attention;
- A training game to elevate your mental health and cognitive thinking;
- A scrabble game to search the hidden words on the mixing letter cubes;
- A quiz up game to kill the time during tedious journey;
- A free idle game to play with your friends, chums and family.
